Miguel Poventud https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miguel_Poventud 0 Miguel Poventud a.k.a. "El Niño Prodigio de Guayama" and "Miguelito" (August 4, 1942 – March 3, 1983), was a Puerto Rican musician, singer, actor and composer of Boleros. Among the singers who have interpreted his musical compositions are Johnny Albino, Héctor Lavoe and Daniel Santos. Miguel_Poventud a.k.a. "_El_Niño_Prodigio de Guayama " and " Miguelito " ( August_4_,_1942 – March_3_,_1983 ) , was a_Puerto_Rican_musician , singer , actor_and_composer of Boleros . Among the_singers who have_interpreted his_musical_compositions are Johnny_Albino , Héctor_Lavoe and Daniel_Santos .
